pH: The pH of a 50 % concentration of A221 in water was theoretically, calculated to be 7.26 at 22 C from a 0.5 % solution in 79.5 % aqueous, dioxane according to the extrapolation procedures of Dr. P. D., Schickedantz, Lozillard Accession Number 1662. Referenced 45- 10- 1.
SOLUBILITY: MUTAGENICITY SOLVENTS, A221 is soluble  EtOH at 0.2 g/ ml, with stirring, at room, temperature. Reference BC30- 88.
ORAL: A221 forms a solution in corn oil at 0.5 g/ 0.5 mL, with stirring, at room temperature. Reference BC30- 88.
PHYSICAL STATE: A crystalline solid at room temperature which melts at > 56 C.
ACUTE CARDIOVASCULAR: A221 is insoluble for this procedure. Reference BC30- 38
STORAGE RECOMMENDATIONS: Refrigerate in an amber glass bottle at no more than 8 C.
